title: Carbene-catalyzed synthesis of a fluorophosphate cathode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5147-5161
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00983E, Paper
Qingfeng Fu, Wang Zhou, Peng Gao, Hongliang Dong, Shi Chen, Changling Fan, Jilei Liu
The critical role of carbene-related species (:CH2) in catalyzing Câ€“F bond breakage in CnF2n was elucidated, which provided an effective fluorine-compensating strategy for synthesizing phase-pure fluorophosphates.
